mapper.select: select s.id, s.title, a.appointment_start, a.appointment_end, ( case when share_user_id = #{userId} THEN 1 else 0 end ) as state from appointment as a left join sharing_board as s on a.board_id = s.id where not_share_user_id = #{userId} or share_user_id = #{userId};

select ANY_VALUE(id) as id, ANY_VALUE(user_id) as user_id, ANY_VALUE(title) as title, ANY_VALUE(hope_area_lat) as hope_area_lat, ANY_VALUE(hope_area_lng) as hope_area_lng, ANY_VALUE(start_day) as start_day, ANY_VALUE(end_day) as end_day, ANY_VALUE(appointment_id) as appointment_id, ANY_VALUE(share_user_id) as share_user_id, ANY_VALUE(not_share_user_id) as not_share_user_id from sharing_board as s right join( select * from appointment where share_user_id = #{userId} ) as a on a.board_id = s.id where (s.state >= 0 and a.state >= 0) group by board_id;
